hone .x-form-label{font-size:.7em}.x-phone .x-form-label{position:relative}.convert-for-it .x-form-label{background-color:#fff;border-right:1px dotted #ddd}.convert-for-it.convert-active .x-form-label{background-color:#f4f776}#inertiaAnswer,#unitsAnswer{border:1px solid #02b3b2;margin:0;padding:0;border-radius:3px}#inertiaAnswer .x-inner,#unitsAnswer .x-inner{border:10px solid #f4f776;border-radius:3px;background:#37fdfc;padding:.5em;text-align:center;font-size:2.5em;color:#c23f2d}#inertiaAnswer .x-inner span.pipe,#unitsAnswer .x-inner span.pipe{color:#f4f776}#inertiaSolutionWrapper{margin:0 auto;width:600px}#inertiaSolutionBox{float:left;width:200px;margin-left:40px;margin-top:20px}#inertiaSolutionBox ul li{margin-bottom:10px}#inertiaSolutionBox li span.unit-type{font-size:smaller}#inertiaCanvas{float:left}.x-phone #inertiaSolutionBox,.x-phone #inertiaCanvas{float:none}
